summary:
I am a 3D digital artist and graduate of International Game Architecture and Design visual arts course at NHTV University of Applied Sciences in Breda.

One of my main interests has always been learning about new technologies and techniques to improve my understanding and work process. My main focus has been character modeling as I have always been fascinated by the beauty of game characters but I have also worked allot on environment arts and props during my projects and school courses.
